channel.title: Is it possible to run multiple acounts on scar?
channel.description:
same as above i just want to know if it is possible to run mutiple acounts on scar.
for example running 3 accounts and having them all mine or something

item.title: Is it possible to run multiple acounts on scar?
item.dc:creator: @bumfluff120 bumfluff120
item.description:
@bumfluff120 wrote:

[quote=“Arkanor, post:12, topic:588”][quote author=bumfluff120 link=topic=381.msg4460#msg4460 date=1142768763]
Wouldn’t you just need to tell scar to switch windows by pressing a spot on the taskbar?
[/quote]

IT’s selecting the client window that’s the problem.[/quote]

Is there a way to get it to just search for a java applet? since it’s the only one on screen?

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to run multiple acounts on scar?

item.title: Is it possible to run multiple acounts on scar?
item.dc:creator: @Reaver Reaver
item.description:
@Reaver wrote:

Multiple Instances do not work as Scar moves by clicking, which Aryan does not. .-. Or so I presume, that Aryan hitches onto the RSclient or simply issues direct commands, rather than letting RS interpret them as User Commands, like Scar

I guesses.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to run multiple acounts on scar?

item.title: Is it possible to run multiple acounts on scar?
item.dc:creator: @3D_BOB 3D BOB
item.source: Is it possible to run multiple acounts on scar?

item.title: Is it possible to run multiple acounts on scar?
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

Lawl. Look up a tut. Aryan requires acquiring JDK and tweaking your system variables or something.

'Tis easier to tell you that SRL supports using queued accounts in succession. Thus only one account is active at a time, but you can auto a number of accounts over a period of time. And it’s less detectable than Aryan.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to run multiple acounts on scar?
